feedDescription: Manage RSS feeds for this server.
feedAddDescription: Add a new RSS feed to a channel.
feedAddUrlDescription: The URL of the RSS feed.
feedAddChannelDescription: The channel to post updates to.
feedAddNicknameDescription: An optional nickname for the feed.
feedAddCategoryDescription: An optional category for the feed.
feedRemoveDescription: Remove an RSS feed from a channel.
feedRemoveFeedIdDescription: The ID or nickname of the feed to remove.
feedRemoveChannelDescription: The channel the feed is associated with.
feedListChannelDescription: List feeds only for a specific channel.
feedTestDescription: Test an RSS feed URL and show a preview.
feedTestUrlDescription: The URL of the RSS feed to test.
categoryDescription: Manage feed categories and their polling frequencies.
categorySetFrequencyDescription: Set the polling frequency (in minutes) for a category.
categoryListDescription: List configured categories and their frequencies.
